text: The VinFast VF 7 is a electric compact Crossover SUV made by VinFast since 2024. == History and Features == The VinFast VF 7 was first shown at the Electronics Consumer Show in 2022 alongside the VinFast VF 5 and the VinFast VF 6. the pre-orders started in December 2022 in Vietnam. with deliveries to Vietnamese customers in March 2024. it was designed by Lee Jae Hoon which is a senior exterior designer for General Motors. it has two versions:the Eco FWD has a electric motor with 150 kW (201 hp) and a range of 450 km (280 mi) while the Plus AWD has a electric motor with 260 kW (349 hp) and a range of 431 km (268 mi). == Markets == The VinFast VF 7 is sold mainly in The Vietnamese market but also in Philipines, Europe, and the United States. == References == Category:Sport utility vehicles Category:2020s automobiles
title: VinFast VF 7
